tutorial_0:
You finally answered, it was about time.
(Press space to advance)
tutorial_1:
I heard BOSS is coming to the office this afternoon, 
so better make sure you're ready.
tutorial_2:
Let's start by the controls. Find a key on your keyboard
that you can press a LOT without consequence.
(for me, it was F7, but could very well be P, tab, +, insert, any key really)
tutorial_3:
Okay, you found it ? Press it. Press Space to lock in your choice.
 You currently chose :
tutorial_4:
You can always change it later, so don't worry
if you wish to change later on.
tutorial_5:
Now, let's look at one of the main ways
you'll interact with I'll Work After This.
tutorial_6:
See this up-arrow in the taskbar below me ?
This is the System Tray.
tutorial_7:
Click on it and search for the game's icon.
Once you found it, right-click it.
tutorial_8:
This is where you will be able
to modify most things in the game,
 such as the language, visibility, etc.
This is also where you close the game.
tutorial_9:
Now, let's talk gameplay.
Most of the gameplay takes place in your file explorer
tutorial_10:
Let me open it for you.
Here you go.
tutorial_11:
In the top left corner of the file explorer window,
there should be info like [       ] 0.0 or something similar.
(if there is nothing, click on the window.)
tutorial_12:
If there is nothing, no problem.
You can either search for another app that works, like the control panel.
(Any app compatible will display the info, try some !
 You can even play this game in other games.)
tutorial_13:
Or hover above the window you're in, in the taskbar.
(If you're in chrome, hover on the chrome icon and look).
tutorial_14:
Now that we know 'where' the game takes places,
let's teach you how to play.
tutorial_15:
Remember the key you selected earlier ?
This is your slack key. Pressing it makes your slack go up by one.
tutorial_16:
With this slack, you can buy upgrades,
which take form of .txt files, that you have to delete to buy.
tutorial_17:
You can buy 5 of the same at once
by holding shift all the way through.
tutorial_18: You can also buy different upgrades by selecting multiple files.
tutorial_19:
Last piece of advice :
you can open the txt file to reveal what the upgrade does.
Trust me, it's important.
